kpi.name: M16B2C23

kpi_info.title: Failed call attempts that have terminated in an error in the trunk circuit (OUT)
kpi_info.use: Number of failed call attempts (0...65535) that have terminated in an error in the trunk circuit, clear codes 800...BFF. The field is updated when the first released circuit is released.

kpi.kpi_alias: Failed call attempts that have terminated in an error in the trunk circuit (OUT)
